what_you_do: Florence Callender is an author, international speaker, communication strategist, and nationally certified speech-language pathologist who has spent over 25 years unlocking the extraordinary power of communication to change lives.
offering: Florence helps leaders elevate their organizations by fostering clarity, alignment, and inclusivity through the art and science of impactful communication.
social_proof: Florence has a Bachelor of Arts in Education and a Master of Arts in Speech Pathology, and decades of professional success.
signature_programs: Florence is the creator of "Learning Made Easy: Success Secrets for Parenting Dyslexia" course, and the author of several forthcoming books including "Lazy Lucy" and an upcoming book for entrepreneurs and executives.
business_focus: Florence's mission is to transform workplaces by empowering leaders to discover their own genius and that of their teams through the art and science of impactful communication.
service_provided: author, international speaker, communication strategist, speech-language pathology
